H0.text: Hot gases make up most of the surface of Earth.

H1.text: Dry land is the feature that makes up most of the surface of Earth.

H2.text: Craters make up most of the surface of Earth.

H3.text: Water makes up most of the surface of Earth.

A4.text: The ocean is the body of salt water that covers approximately 70.8% of Earth.

A5.text: The ocean contains 97% of Earth's water and is the primary component of Earth's hydrosphere, acting as a huge reservoir of heat for Earth's energy budget.
